pl.edu.agh.jdziennik.model.dbaccess

Class DBAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.edu.agh.jdziennik.model.dbaccess.DBAccessor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    WrappingAccessor

    public class DBAccessor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class serves as an abstraction layer between hibernate and the rest of the application. It provides methods that perform certain queries. Instances of this class hold a reference to a hibernate session, which they use to perform queries.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DBAccessor(org.hibernate.Session session)
      Creates a new DBAccessor using the Session passed.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the underlying session, making the accessor object unusable. Any further calls of this accessor's methods produce undefined behaviour.

      • queryAllClasses

        public java.util.List<TeachingClass> queryAllClasses()
        Queries all teaching classes from the database. Uses the underlying hibernate session to get all classes stored in the database and returns them as a list.
        Returns:
        the list

        public java.util.List<TeachingClass> queryClassesTutoredByTeacher(Teacher teacher)

      • queryClassStudents

      • queryClassOfStudent

        public TeachingClass queryClassOfStudent(Student student)
        Queries teaching class of given student from the database. Uses the underlying hibernate session to get the the class student is the member of and returns it.

        Returns:
        the teaching class

      • queryAverageGradeOfStudent

        public java.lang.Float queryAverageGradeOfStudent(Student student,
                                                  Subject subject)
        Computes average grade of given student in given subject. Uses the underlying hibernate session to get the grades of student in subject, then computes and returns their average value. Returns 0.0 in case of lack of grades.
        Parameters:
        student - Is the student, who's grade averge is computed.
        subject - Is the subject, grade average in which is computed.
        Returns:
        the float

      • querySubjectsOfTeacher

        public java.util.List<Subject> querySubjectsOfTeacher(Teacher teacher)
        Queries subjects of given teacher from the database. Uses the underlying hibernate session to get the subjects teacher teaches and returns them as a list.
        Parameters:
        teacher - Is the teacher, who's subjects are queried.
        Returns:
        the list

      • querySubjectsOfTeacherAndClass

        public java.util.List<Subject> querySubjectsOfTeacherAndClass(Teacher teacher,
                                                              TeachingClass teachingClass)
        Queries subjects of given teacher and teaching class from the database. Uses the underlying hibernate session to get the subjects teacher teaches to teachingClass and returns them as a list.
        Parameters:
        teacher - Is the teacher, who's subjects are queried.
        teachingClass - Is the class, subjects of which are queried.
        Returns:
        the list

      • queryStudentAttendance

        public java.util.List<Attendance> queryStudentAttendance(Student student)
        Queries attendances of given student from the database. Uses the underlying hibernate session to get the attendances of student and returns them as a list.
        Parameters:
        student - Is the student, who's attendances are queried.
        Returns:
        the list

      • queryCurrentTimeWindow

        public TimeWindow queryCurrentTimeWindow()
        Queries current time window from the database. Uses the underlying hibernate session to get the time window, that started before the current time and ends after the current time (that is, a time window that is taking place right now) and returns it.
        Returns:
        the time window

      • queryLesson

        public Lesson queryLesson(java.sql.Date date,
                          WeekTerm weekTerm)
        Queries lesson, that took place at given time from the database. Uses the underlying hibernate session to get the lesson, that took place on date on weekTerm and returns it.
        Parameters:
        date - Represents when the queried lesson took place.
        weekTerm - Represents when the queried lesson took place.
        Returns:
        the lesson

      • queryAttendance

        public Attendance queryAttendance(Student student,
                                  Lesson lesson)
        Queries attendance of given student on given lesson from the database. Uses the underlying hibernate session to get the attendance corresponding to student and lesson and returns it.
        Parameters:
        student - Is the student, who's attendance is being queried.
        lesson - Is the lesson, attendance on which is being queried.
        Returns:
        the attendance

      • queryClassSubject

        public ClassSubject queryClassSubject(TeachingClass teachingClass,
                                      Subject subject,
                                      Teacher teacher)
        Queries classSubject of given class, subject and teacher from the database. Uses the underlying hibernate session to get the classSubject corresponding to teachingClass, subject and teacher.
        Parameters:
        teachingClass - Is the class, classSubject of which is queried.
        subject - Is the subject, classSubject of which is queried.
        teacher - Is the teacher, who teaches the classSubject being queried.
        Returns:
        the class subject

      • queryWeekTerm

        public WeekTerm queryWeekTerm(WeekTerm.Day day,
                              TimeWindow timeWindow,
                              Teacher teacher,
                              TeachingClass teachingClass)
        Queries week term of given teacher and class on given time from the database. Uses the underlying hibernate session to get the week term teacher has with teachingClass during timeWindow on day.
        Parameters:
        day - Is the day, on which the queried week term takes place.
        timeWindow - Is the time window, during which the queried week term takes place.
        teacher - Is the teacher, who leads lessons on the queried week term.
        teachingClass - Is the class, that has lessons on the queriede week term.
        Returns:
        the week term

      • queryPresenceCount

        public java.lang.Long queryPresenceCount(Student student,
                                         Attendance.AttendanceValue attendanceValue)
        Queries number of given kind of attendances of given student from the database. Uses the underlying hibernate session to get the attendances of student with value equal to attendanceValue and returns their count.
        Parameters:
        student - Is the student, who's attendances are queried.
        attendanceValue - Represents what kind of attendances are being queried (i.e. presences or justified unpresences).
        Returns:
        the long

      • queryPresence

        public java.util.List<Attendance> queryPresence(Student student,
                                                Attendance.AttendanceValue attendanceValue)
        Queries given kind of attendances of given student from the database. Uses the underlying hibernate session to get the attendances of student with value equal to attendanceValue and returns them as a list.
        Parameters:
        student - Is the student, who's attendances are queried.
        attendanceValue - Represents what kind of attendances are being queried (i.e. presences or justified unpresences).
        Returns:
        the list

      • queryPresenceWithDate

        public java.util.List<Attendance> queryPresenceWithDate(Student student,
                                                        Attendance.AttendanceValue attendanceValue,
                                                        java.sql.Date from,
                                                        java.sql.Date to)
        Queries number of given kind of attendances of given student in the given time period from the database. Uses the underlying hibernate session to get the attendances of student with value equal to attendanceValue. Only attendances from the time period specified by from and to are takrn into accout. The attendances are returned as a list.
        Parameters:
        student - Is the student, who's attendances are queried.
        attendanceValue - Represents what kind of attendances are being queried (i.e. presences or justified unpresences).
        from - Represents the start of the time period in which the attendances are being queired.
        to - Represents the end of the time period in which the attendances are being queired.
        Returns:
        the list

      • persistObject

        public void persistObject(java.lang.Object object)
        Persists given object in the database. Uses underlying session to tie object with hibernate session and add it to the database.
        Parameters:
        object - Is the object to persist.

      • persistObjects

        public void persistObjects(java.util.List list)
        Persists all objects in given list in the database. Uses underlying session to tie list's members with hibernate session and add them to the database.
        Parameters:
        list - Contains the objects to persist.

      • updateObject

        public void updateObject(java.lang.Object object)
        Updates given object in the database. Uses underlying session to save the new state of object in the database.
        Parameters:
        object - Is the modified object, old state of which is present in the databse.

      • deleteObject

        public void deleteObject(java.lang.Object object)
        Deletes given object from the database. Uses underlying session to remove object from the database.
        Parameters:
        object - Is the object to remove.
